fullplot: Four kids - Eugen, Wrigley, Bèschteli and Eduard - leave for an adventure around Switzerland, searching for the fabulous treasure of Titicaca Lake, discovered by Fritzli Bèhler.
plot: Four kids - Eugen, Wrigley, Bèschteli and Eduard - leave for an adventure around Switzerland, searching for the fabulous treasure of Titicaca Lake, discovered by Fritzli Bèhler.
title: Rascals on the Road
